body.intro: My name is Joe. I'm a Software Developer based in the Midwest.
body.interests: I enjoy all things code, from scripting to application development. My current interests lie in full stack development, modern software architectures and elegant UI designs.
body.education: I completed my undergraduate degree in May of 2019 at Kansas State University earning a B.S. in Computer Science. Prior to that, I attended Butler Community College, earning an A.S. in Mathematics.

education.description: My education at KSU was very broad, challenging, and a lot of fun. The faculty and instructors there were integral in me establishing foundation I still rely on today.
I attended Butler Community College directly after high school. I tried my hand at a few different majors, but found myself in Mathematics.

expertise.title: My Experience
expertise.body: Below are a few personal projects depicting my skillset and a list of the things I’ve worked with lately.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.summary: This is a portfolio I made for myself using React, JS, and CSS.

projects.title: Chase& Co. Website
projects.summary: This is an in-progress front-end client I am making for my band using Vue, JS, and CSS.

projects.title: Adventext
projects.summary: This is a text-based adventure game I am building with my friends using Angular, AWS, and a NoSQL Database. The main idea is that players would their own adventure while other players could add options to the decision tree.

body.intro: Music has always been a big part of my life and has impacted me in a variety of positive ways. It has allowed me to connect with others and I’ve found it to be the perfect medium for conveying an emotion, thought, or belief.
body.story: I’ve been an active musician now for over a decade, gigging and recording whenever the opportunity arises. My goal is to positively impact others by writing, producing, and contributing to music that is universally relatable.

projects.title: Chase & Co.
projects.summary: The chase and co. band summary.
